source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_00<tab>Ysayle awaits an opportunity to surrender to the Gnath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_00<tab>Ysayle pense que le moment de vous laisser capturer par les Gnathes est arrivé.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_01<tab>You have forced your way deep into the heart of Loth ast Gnath, provoking an ever more frenzied response from its many defenders. Satisfied with the chaos you have sown, Ysayle bids you offer no further resistance to the soldiers swarming about you. Surrender quietly, and allow the Gnath to take you prisoner.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_01<tab>Ysayle et vous avez été encerclé<var 08 E905 ((es)) ((s)) /var> par les Gnathes et vous avez décidé que c'était le bon moment pour tenter d'atteindre leur Primordial sans encombre. Rendez-vous sans faire de vagues et vous devriez arriver à votre destination sous peu.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_02<tab>The Gnath have taken you to a cave on the far side of the hive. Could this be where you will meet their mysterious deity? Enter the inner chamber, and see what manner of being awaits you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_02<tab>Les Gnathes vous ont conduit<var 08 E905 ((es)) ((s)) /var> dans la salle des offrandes, une caverne à l'intérieur de Loth ast Gnath. Se pourrait-il que leur Primordial se terre quelque part dans cet endroit sombre et humide<var 1D /var>? Dirigez-vous vers la pièce du fond pour en avoir le cœur net, ou retournez à l'air libre via la sortie au nord de la salle des offrandes si vous souhaitez vous préparer.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_03You do not have to wait long before Lord Ravana, Master of the Sacred Blades and Wrath of the Colony, arrives to claim his sacrifices. Seizing the opportunity, Ysayle boldly questions the primal about his war with the dragons, before challenging him to a contest of might. Not one to shy away from a fight, Ravana accepts, and terms are duly agreed. If you prevail, the Gnath must cease hostilities with the Dravanians; but should Ravana emerge the victor, you will join his army as eternal thralls. Having goaded the primal into giving his word, Ysayle draws upon the energy of the Gnath's hoarded crystals to transform herself into Saint Shiva, and battle is joined. Even with Shiva's great strength, however, the heretic leader is no match for Ravana's flashing blades. As Ysayle sinks to her knees, defeated, the triumphant god's eyes alight on you. Take to the field and match your prowess against the self-proclaimed Conqueror of the World!

※Thok ast Thok (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_03Le Primordial Ravana est apparu sous vos yeux ébahis, et Ysayle a immédiatement invoqué Shiva pour le combattre et honorer sa promesse aux dragons de les défendre coûte que coûte. Hélas, Ravana était beaucoup trop fort pour la Furie des neiges, qui s'est retrouvée balayée en un éclair. La pression est désormais sur vos épaules! Montrez à ce nouveau Primordial qu'il ferait mieux de craindre Guerri de la Lumière!
* Vous pouvez utiliser l'outil de mission afin de trouver des équipiers pour relever ce défi.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_04<tab>After a long and furious battle, Lord Ravana at last lays down his blades defeated. He duly proclaims you the victor by sacred rite of combat, and vows to call his followers back from the dragons' domain. Return now in triumph to the Dravanian forelands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_04<tab>Vous êtes sorti<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> victorieu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var> de votre duel contre la divinité des Gnathes.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_05<tab>You return to the Dravanian forelands having added the name of yet another primal to the list of your defeated foes. Speak with Ysayle by the river outside of Loth ast Gnath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_05<tab>Vous êtes retourné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> sans encombre dans l'Avant-pays dravanien. Parlez à Ysayle, près de Loth ast Gnath.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_06<tab>Ysayle praises you for besting Ravana, while lamenting her own failure to test the primal. Sensing her despondence, you contemplate telling her that things might have been different had she not weakened your foe─only to realize that the moment has passed. Return to Loth ast Vath, and inform Alphinaud of your success.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_06<tab>Maintenant qu'Ysayle et vous êtes en sécurité, retournez à Loth ast Vath et parlez à Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_07<tab>Back at Loth ast Vath, you regale your companions with the tale of your victory over the Gnath's god. When Estinien subsequently reveals that your fellow Scion spent the hours leading up to your return “fretting like a maid for her sweetheart,” Alphinaud declares that you must press on with the mission─more, you sense, to escape the dragoon's mocking tongue than out of concern for Ishgard. He is, however, correct. Make your way back to Anyx Trine, and share news of your triumph with Vidofnir.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le jeune Élézen en compagnie du Dragon céleste. Il est temps de vous présenter à nouveau devant Vidofnir pour lui annoncer la bonne nouvelle de votre victoire contre Ravana.
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_TODO_01<tab>Aller dans la pièce du fond de la salle des offrandes

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_TODO_02<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Ravana in Thok ast Thok (Hard).
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_TODO_03<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Ravana in Thok ast Thok (Hard).

target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_100_000<tab>Ton regard en dit long sur ta motivation<var 1D /var>! Je suppose donc que nous pouvons y aller<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_000<tab>Hold here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. When next the Gnath come, we offer no resistance.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_000<tab>Le moment est proche, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. À la prochaine escouade, nous jetons les armes.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSOLDIER01616_000_001<tab>(-Gnath soldiers-)Surrender, intruders! There is no escape!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSOLDIER01616_000_001<tab>(-Gnathes-)<var 08 E905 ((Elles)) ((Ils)) /var> sont là<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment, humain<var 08 E905 ((es)) ((s)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_002<tab>Enough! We surrender! We throw ourselves upon the mercy of your god!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_002<tab>Nous... Nous sommes à bout de souffle<var 1D /var>! Vous avez gagné, Gnathes, nous capitulons<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes les plus forts, et nos cœurs sont prêts à recevoir la punition du sacrifice en l'honneur de votre dieu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_010<tab>They seem eager to proceed. Good. When they take us before their lord, pray leave matters to me. If what I know of summoning rituals holds true, I shall be well placed to act.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_010<tab>Nous devrions faire face au Primordial des Gnathes très bientôt. Le sacrifice nécessite forcément certains préparatifs plus ou moins longs. Nous devons nous tenir prêt<var 08 E905 ((es)) ((s)) /var> car cela risque d'être notre seule chance d'agir.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_011<tab>...Hmmm. Mark the sound of the river rushing through the ravine behind us. Passing loud, is it not? I imagine the noise would serve to mask our escape should we need to withdraw temporarily.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_011<tab>Comme tu peux l'entendre, il y a une rivière qui s'écoule dans la vallée juste derrière nous. Sers-toi du bruit de l'eau pour sortir de cette caverne sans te faire remarquer.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_012<tab>But you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> prepared, are you not? I do hope so. If I were to be dragged away for sacrifice while you were haggling over the price of potions, I should <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be amused.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_012<tab>Tant que les Gnathes n'auront pas terminé de préparer la cérémonie, je resterai pour faire diversion. Pendant ce temps, je compte sur toi pour revenir en temps voulu.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_003<tab>Though I dismissed Master Alphinaud's concerns, I confess that I did wonder how the Gnath might treat their prisoners. Happily, it would seem they are not wont to harm sacrifices─nor even to <var 1A 02 /var>disarm<var 1A 01 /var> them. Plainly, they imagine their god invulnerable. The plan goes better than expected...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_003<tab>Pour l'instant, tout se passe comme prévu. Nous n'avons plus qu'à attendre de nous retrouver devant le Primordial.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSOLDIER01616_000_004<tab>Try to escape and we will break your fleshy legs.
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSENTRY01616_000_005<tab>Try to escape and we will break your fleshy legs.
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_006<tab>The time is come. Let us bring an end to this unpleasant business.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_006<tab>Il est temps de s'introduire dans le repaire des Gnathes<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_Q1_000_1<tab>Voulez-vous entrer dans la salle des offrandes<var 1D /var>?

TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_013<tab>(souffle) Je ne m'attendais pas... à une telle puissance... J'ai honte mais... je n'ai rien pu faire... Bonne chance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHPRIEST_000_014<tab>The Wrath of the Colony is undefeated! Victory to the Gnath!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHPRIEST_000_014<tab>Le Maître des lames est invincible<var 1D /var>! Gloire à Ravana<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSOLDIER01616_000_015<tab>The Wrath of the Colony is undefeated! Victory to the Gnath!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSOLDIER01616_000_015<tab>Le Maître des lames est invincible<var 1D /var>! Gloire à Ravana<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSENTRY01616_000_016<tab>The Wrath of the Colony is undefeated! Victory to the Gnath!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_GNATHSENTRY01616_000_016<tab>Le Maître des lames est invincible<var 1D /var>! Gloire à Ravana<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_020<tab>Never since we first fought have I seen you draw upon the full extent of your power...and never from <var 1A 02 /var>afar<var 1A 01 /var> till this day. You were a marvel to behold, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_020<tab>Je n'ai pas été à la hauteur mais heureusement, j'étais accompagnée <var 08 E905 ((de la Guerrière)) ((du Guerrier)) /var> de la Lumière. Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_021<tab>Well...'tis time we rejoined our companions. They will be eager to hear the tale...and to continue our journey.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_000_021<tab>Vidofnir sera enchantée de nous voir revenir victorieu<var 08 E905 ((ses)) ((x)) /var>. Rejoignons d'abord Alphinaud et Estinien avant de retourner auprès d'elle.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ESTINIEN_000_022<tab>The antmen's god is fallen, then? Impressive, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ESTINIEN_000_022<tab>Un grand bravo à toi, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Tu as prouvé une nouvelle fois que tu étais digne de ton titre.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_100_022<tab>Are you unharmed, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? What of Lady Ysayle?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_100_022<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous êtes déjà de retour<var 1D /var>? Mais qu'avez-vous fait d'Ysayle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Lady Ysayle! Thank the Twelve!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Ysayle<var 1D /var>! Les Douze soient loués<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>...“Lord Ravana,” you say? How curious that the Vath never mentioned his name... And you are quite certain he will keep his word?
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>Ainsi donc, le nom de ce Primordial est Ravana... S'il vous a proposé un pacte de non-agression, c'est que la notion d'honneur doit être essentielle pour un tel dieu de la guerre. Nous devrions la respecter également.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_100_032<tab>That we survived the encounter at all was a miracle─a miracle I must attribute to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_100_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je tiens encore une fois à te remercier. À cause de ma maladresse, notre plan aurait com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment échoué si tu n'avais pas été là.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ESTINIEN_000_033<tab>Never did I doubt you, Warrior of Light...unlike some. You were gone so long that Master Alphinaud here nigh lost his wits with worry. Fretting like a maid for her sweetheart, he was!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ESTINIEN_000_033<tab>Toutes mes félicitations, mais on peut dire que vous en aurez mis du temps<var 1D /var>! Si vous aviez vu l'état dans lequel était Alphinaud pendant votre absence... On aurait dit qu'il allait se mettre à pleurer comme un bébé<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ESTINIEN_000_035<tab>Héhé... Je ne fais que dire la vérité.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_036<tab>Ahem! What matters is that the primal is banished, and our promise fulfilled. We should return to Vidofnir without delay.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_036<tab>Bref<var 1D /var>! Maintenant que la menace du Primordial des Gnathes est écartée, il nous faut retourner auprès de Vidofnir.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_037<tab>Lest you forget, this was but a means to secure an audience with the wyrm Hraesvelgr. Nidhogg's minions will not be halted by idle chatter! Come, now─we must make every moment count!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ALPHINAUD_000_037<tab>Nidhogg peut attaquer Ishgard à tout moment, et Hraesvelgr est le seul qui peut nous dire comment empêcher une telle catastrophe. Hâtons-nous avant qu'il ne soit trop tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_100_037<tab>You are unkind, Estinien. For all his experience and intellect, Alphinaud is still but a boy.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA315_01616_ICEHEART_100_037<tab>Quel tact, Dragon céleste... Tu devrais savoir qu'on ne se moque pas ainsi de ceux qui manquent d'expérience. Alphinaud a un grand potentiel et tu risques de le démotiver.
